column4: newb question, how much does a default ubuntu 10 desktop install stick to a hardware profile, if I just took the partition from a HP desktop and dd it on to a Dell laptop (along with setting up grub) it should just work? or is it anal about hardware and the holds onto the intial probing to dear death
All drivers other than vidcard are default installed into the module ramdisk
And there will be _something_ there for vidcard, just perhaps not the accelerated one
